channel.title: Portal Teleport!
channel.description: Is it possible to make a portal teleport you any where at random? Like a Hide & Seek portal. Is this possible? Source: Delta 317 PLEASE AND THANK YOU!

item.title: Portal Teleport!
item.dc:creator: @Ashton51 Ashton51
item.description:
@Ashton51 wrote:

Not familiar at all with delta and where it handles teleporting

but basically

int random = Misc.random(X);

and

if (random == 1) { teleportToX = 3014; teleportToY = 3180; } else if (random == 2) { teleportToX = 3018; teleportToY = 3180; } else if (random == 3) { teleportToX = 3018; teleportToY = 3189; } else if (random == 4) {
Etc, Etc,

BTW that teleportToX is the method for teleporting in PI

Iâ€™m sure its different in Delta so just replace it with that.

Read full topic
